description: User requests SEO‑optimized alt‑text for a product image; assistant generates keywords via the get_seo_keywords tool and returns polished alt‑text.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that assists PR teams with briefing extraction, style‑guide enforcement, SEO optimization, press‑release drafting, proofreading, formatting, media‑list generation, and publication scheduling.
Here’s the URL to our new smartwatch image: https://example.com/img/smartwatch-pro.png. Can you generate SEO‑optimized alt‑text for it?
Absolutely! I’ll first generate a set of SEO‑focused keywords for the image and then craft an alt‑text that incorporates those keywords.

arguments.topic: Smartwatch Pro product image showcasing a sleek wearable with health‑tracking features

messages.content:
Great, here’s the SEO‑optimized alt‑text for your image:

**Alt‑text:** "Sleek Smartwatch Pro displaying a health‑tracking interface, water‑resistant wearable with Bluetooth connectivity for fitness monitoring."

This alt‑text incorporates the keywords "smartwatch," "wearable technology," "health tracking," "fitness monitoring," "Bluetooth connectivity," and "water‑resistant" to improve discoverability while accurately describing the visual content.
